ThingDef.label: dinobear incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a bear-Spinosaur hybrid

ThingDef.label: dinoboomalope incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a boomalope-Parasaur hybrid

ThingDef.label: dinochicken incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a chicken-Compsognathus hybrid

ThingDef.label: dinoinsectoid incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a megascarab-Diplodocus hybrid

ThingDef.label: dinomuffalo incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a muffalo-Triceratops hybrid

ThingDef.label: dinoreptile incubator
ThingDef.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a turtle-Utahraptor hybrid

ThingDef.label: dinothrumbo incubator
